markdown: [1] CyclOSM is a brand new bike-oriented map based on OpenStreetMap data. The goal is to provide a beautiful and practical map for cyclists, regardless of their habits or abilities. A global server is available at [https:/www.cyclosm.org](https://www.cyclosm.org/#map=13/49.4118/8.6983/cyclosm) supported by OSM-France

![lead picture](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2019/10/480_T_EN.png =925x480)

CyclOSM is a brand new bike-oriented map [^1^](#wn80_21017) | Leaflet | CyclOSM v0.2 | Map data © OpenStreetMap contributors

Florimond Berthoux [announced](https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/talk/2020-February/084257.html) the release of a new version of [CyclOSM](https://www.cyclosm.org/), on its first anniversary. In his mail he briefly mentions the rendering improvements made in recent versions.

CyclOSM v0.3.5 has been released with new features such as mountain bike difficulty scales, inner tube vending machines, and railways at low zooms... A short overview can be seen in the [release twitter post](https://twitter.com/CyclOSMorg/status/1250509136330215424) and the full [change log here](https://github.com/cyclosm/cyclosm-cartocss-style/releases/tag/v0.3.5).
CyclOSM [has released](https://github.com/cyclosm/cyclosm-cartocss-style/releases/tag/v0.3.7) its new 0.3.7 version, including many rendering improvements.

[1] With [little fanfare](https://github.com/openstreetmap/openstreetmap-website/pull/2994), [CyclOSM](https://www.cyclosm.org/), a beautiful and practical bicycle-oriented map, was [added to the default layers](https://www.openstreetmap.org/#map=13/52.2020/0.1511&layers=Y) on openstreetmap.org.

![lead picture](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2021/01/548_T_EN-1.png =926x508)

CyclOSM now a default layer on openstreetmap.org  [^1^](#wn548_24187) |  © Tiles style by CyclOSM hosted by OpenStreetMap France |  map data © OpenStreetMap contributors

_CyclOSM_ [released](https://github.com/cyclosm/cyclosm-cartocss-style/releases/tag/v0.5) the version 0.5 update of its map, featuring contour lines, cycle tracks and better rendering of lanes shared between buses and bicycles.

![lead picture](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2021/03/555_T_all.png =810x573)

CyclOSM released the 0.5 update of it’s map [[^1^](#wn555_24543)] | © [CyclOSM.org](https://www.cyclosm.org/#map=3/56.80/19.69/cyclosm) | map data © [OpenStreetMap contributors](https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright)
... [CyclOSM](https://www.cyclosm.org/)? This is one of two bicycle maps featured as layers on the main OSM site.
